name: The King of Creation
description: This is a shooting game with exquisite game backgrounds and character images. The 3D surround sound effect makes you feel as if you are in the game. The rich scenes and props bring different gaming experiences. The gameplay is simple and easy to learn, allowing you to boldly attack in a novel and terrifying atmosphere. The home of the game is in a dark and gloomy battlefield. Press the left mouse button to start shooting, and simply aim at the enemy to eliminate them. Please note that you are facing a lot of enemies, so be sure to seize the opportunity and not waste your bullets. Innovative and fun modes, smooth and interesting content, highly strategic, and worth a try. So, warriors, please raise your weapon and aim at the monster to shoot freely!
